General Magic.Description: magic in its natural form, not harmful to the world or creatures

Path Magic (Origo).Description: original form of magic, stronger and harder to counteract than general magic

Magic Use.Description: using magic by feeling it around you
using artefacts to better feel or make you stronger

Learning and Growth.Description: regular practice allows magic users to refine their skills
delving into ancient texts, seeking mentors, or experimenting with new techniques
working under the guidance of experienced magic users

Hologram.Description: a three-dimensional image formed by the interference of light waves

OBE.Description: an experience where a person's consciousness or spirit temporarily leaves their physical body

Gateway.Description: a method for achieving higher states of consciousness or spiritual growth

Statements.Statement: the gateway technique can lead to personal growth and self-discovery

Weaving.definition: manipulate the fabric of reality itself
Weaving.purpose: maintain balance and order in the universe

components.name: Spellcasting System
components.description: rules and mechanics behind spell casting

components.name: Spellcasting Ability
components.description: ability that allows a character to cast a spell

components.name: Spellcasting Spellbook
components.description: where the spellcasting ability is stored

Nemensi Magic System.creator: Alan
Nemensi Magic System.description: uses memory and experience to fuel craft

Plant and Soil Based Magic System.creator: Aaron
Plant and Soil Based Magic System.description: based on powerful beings who roamed the earth, each possessing a unique ability
Plant and Soil Based Magic System.history: infused in soil, giving plants certain powers relating to their gift

Divine Creator Magic System.description: magic created by divine creator and is intrinsically good but not meant for mortals

Bloodlines of Gods Magic System.description: based on 12 gods creating world through stories, each ruler having powerful force

Heartbeat Magic System.description: interaction with society changes depending on who they're interacting with

Sorcerers.relationship with Weavers: may be unaware of their existence or see them as myth-makers

Mages.relationship with Weavers: may be aware of their presence but not fully understand their capabilities

Warlocks.relationship with Weavers: may have made pacts with them in the past or seek to do so

Spellcasting Framework.definition: component that defines the rules and mechanics behind spell casting

Weaving.definition: manipulate the fabric of reality itself
Weaving.methodology: weave threads of fate into existence, creating new possibilities and outcomes

types_of_paths_or_sequences.name: Precision
types_of_paths_or_sequences.description: accuracy, attention to detail, and precision in all endeavors

types_of_paths_or_sequences.name: Harmony
types_of_paths_or_sequences.description: creating beautiful music, art, or other forms of expression through the combination of different elements

types_of_paths_or_sequences.name: Chaos
types_of_paths_or_sequences.description: causing chaos, destruction, and disorder for its own sake

types_of_paths_or_sequences.name: Revolution
types_of_paths_or_sequences.description: overthrowing existing power structures and institutions through violent or disruptive means

descriptions_of_processes_or_procedures.name: The Great Convergence
descriptions_of_processes_or_procedures.description: unpredictable magical energies and interactions between realms causing worlds to converge

descriptions_of_processes_or_procedures.name: Sequence Building
descriptions_of_processes_or_procedures.description: a process that will be revealed in the world Zoul

Wisdom's Path.description: A path that involves seeking wisdom and knowledge

Dogma.description: A set of principles or beliefs that are accepted as true without question

Hierarchy.description: A system of organizing people or things in a series of ranks or levels

meditation.description: A practice of focusing one's mind and thoughts to achieve relaxation and inner peace

prayer.description: The act of communicating with a higher power or deity

sequences.name: Chaos
sequences.description: A sequence that involves disorder and randomness

justification for existence.description: makes reader believe in magic system

winners: Aaron's Plant and Soil Based Magic System

Fantasy Literature and Series.Magic System: Soft Magic, leaning more towards simplicity rather than complexity

Fantasy Literature and Series.Series: Powder Mage books by Brian McClellan
Fantasy Literature and Series.Magic System: Elemental magic tied to fingers on the hands

Fantasy Literature and Series.Series: Ruin Lords series by David Farlin
Fantasy Literature and Series.Magic System: Endowments, where individuals give aspects of themselves to others and find themselves greatly reduced in return

Characters.Name: Ruf
Characters.Description: Tutor, initially portrayed as an antagonist due to his sarcastic nature

Characters.Name: Blake
Characters.Description: Mafia gang leader, boyfriend of Vivi

Themes.Theme: Importance of being true to oneself and not trying to please everyone else
People are not always what they seem from the outside
